question: How many more games were sold on game platform ID 50 than on game platform ID 51 in region ID 1?
query: SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN T.game_platform_id = 50 THEN T.num_sales ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN T.game_platform_id = 51 THEN T.num_sales ELSE 0 END)) * 100000 AS nums FROM region_sales AS T WHERE T.region_id = 1

question: Please list all the games that have the same game genre as 3D Lemmings.
query: SELECT T1.game_name FROM game AS T1 WHERE T1.genre_id = ( SELECT T.genre_id FROM game AS T WHERE T.game_name = '3D Lemmings' )

question: How many action games are there in total?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.id) FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T2.genre_name = 'Action'

question: What is the genre of 3D Lemmings?
query: SELECT T2.genre_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T1.game_name = '3D Lemmings'

question: Who is the publisher of 3D Lemmings?
query: SELECT T3.publisher_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T1.game_name = '3D Lemmings'

question: Please list the names of all the games published by 10TACLE Studios.
query: SELECT T1.game_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T3.publisher_name = '10TACLE Studios'

question: Among the games published by 10TACLE Studios, how many of them are puzzles?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.id) FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T1.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T4.genre_name = 'Puzzle' AND T3.publisher_name = '10TACLE Studios'

question: Please list the names of all the games published by 10TACLE Studios and are puzzles.
query: SELECT T1.game_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T1.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T3.publisher_name = '10TACLE Studios' AND T4.genre_name = 'Puzzle'

question: Which publisher has published the most games?
query: SELECT T.publisher_name FROM ( SELECT T2.publisher_name, COUNT(DISTINCT T2.id) FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id GROUP BY T1.publisher_id ORDER BY COUNT(T2.id) DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: On which platform was Panzer Tactics released in 2007?
query: SELECT T5.platform_name FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T1.game_id = T3.id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T4 ON T1.id = T4.game_publisher_id INNER JOIN platform AS T5 ON T4.platform_id = T5.id WHERE T3.game_name = 'Panzer Tactics' AND T4.release_year = 2007

question: In which year was Panzer Tactics released on DS?
query: SELECT T4.release_year FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T1.game_id = T3.id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T4 ON T1.id = T4.game_publisher_id INNER JOIN platform AS T5 ON T4.platform_id = T5.id WHERE T3.game_name = 'Panzer Tactics' AND T5.platform_name = 'DS'

question: Please list the names of the publishers of all the puzzle games.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T3.publisher_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T1.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T4.genre_name = 'Puzzle'

question: What is the name of the publisher that has published the most puzzle games?
query: SELECT T.publisher_name FROM ( SELECT T3.publisher_name, COUNT(DISTINCT T1.id) FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T1.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T4.genre_name = 'Puzzle' GROUP BY T3.publisher_name ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT T1.id) DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: How many publishers have published more than 3 puzzle games?
query: SELECT COUNT(T.publisher_name) FROM ( SELECT T3.publisher_name, COUNT(DISTINCT T1.id) FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T1.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T4.genre_name = 'Puzzle' GROUP BY T3.publisher_name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T1.id) > 3 ) t

question: Among the games published by Nintendo, what is the percentage of those in the genre of sports?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T4.genre_name = 'Sports' THEN T1.id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100/ COUNT(T1.id) FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T1.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T3.publisher_name = 'Nintendo'

question: How many games were sold on the DS platform on average in the 4 different regions?
query: SELECT SUM(T1.num_sales) * 100000 / 4 FROM region_sales AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.game_platform_id = T2.id INNER JOIN platform AS T3 ON T2.platform_id = T3.id WHERE T3.platform_name = 'DS'

question: Tell the number of games whose publisher id is 352.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T.game_id FROM game_publisher AS T WHERE T.publisher_id = 352

question: List the genre id of the game Pro Evolution Soccer 2012.
query: SELECT T.genre_id FROM game AS T WHERE T.game_name = 'Pro Evolution Soccer 2012'

question: State the region id of Japan.
query: SELECT T.id FROM region AS T WHERE T.region_name = 'Japan'

question: Show the id of the game platform with the most sales in region 2.
query: SELECT T1.game_platform_id FROM ( SELECT T.game_platform_id, SUM(T.num_sales) FROM region_sales AS T WHERE T.region_id = 2 GROUP BY T.game_platform_id ORDER BY SUM(T.num_sales) DESC LIMIT 1 ) T1

question: Which genre has the most games? Show its id.
query: SELECT genre_id FROM ( SELECT T.genre_id, COUNT(T.id) FROM game AS T GROUP BY T.genre_id ORDER BY COUNT(T.id) DESC LIMIT 1 )

question: What is the id of the game "Resident Evil Archives: Resident Evil"?
query: SELECT T.genre_id FROM game AS T WHERE T.game_name = 'Resident Evil Archives: Resident Evil'

question: Show the number of games which were released on X360 in 2010.
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T3.game_id) FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T2.game_publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T1.platform_name = 'X360' AND T2.release_year = 2010

question: State the publisher name of the game "ModNation Racers".
query: SELECT T1.publisher_name FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id WHERE T3.game_name = 'ModNation Racers'

question: Show the id of game platform which makes the most sales in Japan.
query: SELECT T.game_platform_id FROM ( SELECT T2.game_platform_id, MAX(T2.num_sales) FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id WHERE T1.region_name = 'Japan' ) t

question: How many platforms are available for the game Pro Evolution Soccer 2016?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.id) FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN platform AS T2 ON T1.platform_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T3.id INNER JOIN game AS T4 ON T3.game_id = T4.id WHERE T4.game_name = 'Pro Evolution Soccer 2016'

question: How many games in the database belong to the genre of sports?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.id) FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T2.genre_name = 'Sports'

question: Name of the publisher of the game id 10031.
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id WHERE T1.game_id = 10031

question: State the name of the publisher with the most games.
query: SELECT T.publisher_name FROM ( SELECT T2.publisher_name, COUNT(DISTINCT T1.game_id) FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id GROUP BY T2.publisher_name ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT T1.game_id) DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: How many more sports games than simulation games?
query: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.genre_name = 'Sports' THEN T2.id ELSE NULL END) - COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.genre_name = 'Simulation' THEN T2.id ELSE NULL END) FROM genre AS T1 INNER JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.genre_id

question: Tell the genre of the game "Resident Evil: Revelations".
query: SELECT T2.genre_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T1.game_name = 'Resident Evil: Revelations'

question: How many sales does game platform id 3871 make in Europe?
query: SELECT T2.num_sales * 100000 FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id WHERE T1.region_name = 'Europe' AND T2.game_platform_id = 3871

question: Give the number of games which were published by Ascaron Entertainment GmbH.
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.game_id) FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T1.publisher_name = 'Ascaron Entertainment GmbH'

question: Show the name of the earliest platform in the database.
query: SELECT T2.platform_name FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN platform AS T2 ON T1.platform_id = T2.id ORDER BY T1.release_year ASC LIMIT 1

question: For all the games which were published by Namco Bandai Games, what percentage of them were adventure games?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T4.genre_name = 'Adventure' THEN T1.id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.id) FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T1.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T3.publisher_name = 'Namco Bandai Games'

question: How many times more is the number of games which were published by Atari than Athena?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.publisher_name = 'Atari' THEN T2.game_id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) / COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.publisher_name = 'Athena' THEN T2.game_id ELSE NULL END) FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id

question: How many games did Electronic Arts publish?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T2.game_id) FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id WHERE T1.publisher_name = 'Electronic Arts'

question: What is the genre of the Advent Rising game?
query: SELECT T2.genre_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T1.game_name = 'Advent Rising'

question: How many role-playing games did Microsoft Game Studios publish?
query: SELECT COUNT(T3.id) FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T3.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T4.genre_name = 'Role-Playing' AND T1.publisher_name = 'Microsoft Game Studios'

question: Which publisher published the most games?
query: SELECT T.publisher_name FROM ( SELECT T2.publisher_name, COUNT(DISTINCT T1.game_id) FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id GROUP BY T2.publisher_name ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT T1.game_id) DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: In 2004, what are the names of the platforms where Codemasters publish its games?
query: SELECT T4.platform_name FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.game_publisher_id INNER JOIN platform AS T4 ON T3.platform_id = T4.id WHERE T3.release_year = 2004 AND T1.publisher_name = 'Codemasters'

question: How many games were released on PS4 in 2014?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T3.game_id) FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T2.game_publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T1.platform_name = 'PS4' AND T2.release_year = 2014

question: What are the names of the publishers who published the oldest games?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T3.publisher_name FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id ORDER BY T1.release_year LIMIT 1

question: How many publishers in Japan released a game on X360 in 2011?
query: SELECT COUNT(T3.game_publisher_id) FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.game_platform_id = T3.id INNER JOIN platform AS T4 ON T3.platform_id = T4.id WHERE T4.platform_name = 'X360' AND T3.release_year = 2011 AND T1.region_name = 'Japan'

question: Which game platform is the most popular in Europe?
query: SELECT T.platform_name FROM ( SELECT T4.platform_name, SUM(T2.num_sales) FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.game_platform_id = T3.id INNER JOIN platform AS T4 ON T3.platform_id = T4.id WHERE T1.region_name = 'Europe' ORDER BY T2.num_sales DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: Which year has the most number of PC games releases?
query: SELECT T.release_year FROM ( SELECT T2.release_year, COUNT(DISTINCT T3.game_id) FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T2.game_publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T1.platform_name = 'PC' GROUP BY T2.release_year ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT T3.game_id) DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: List the names of all the publishers who published one game only.
query: SELECT T.publisher_name FROM ( SELECT T2.publisher_name, COUNT(DISTINCT T1.game_id) FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id GROUP BY T2.publisher_name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T1.game_id) = 1 ) t

question: What are the names of the games that were published by 505 Games?
query: SELECT T3.game_name FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id WHERE T1.publisher_name = '505 Games'

question: What is the genre ID of the game named 25 to Life?
query: SELECT T.genre_id FROM game AS T WHERE T.game_name = '25 to Life'

question: List down the game ID of games with genre ID 2.
query: SELECT T.id FROM game AS T WHERE T.genre_id = 2

question: Provide the release year of record ID 1 to 10.
query: SELECT T.release_year FROM game_platform AS T WHERE T.id BETWEEN 1 AND 10

question: Give the game publisher ID of records with platform ID 15.
query: SELECT T.game_publisher_id FROM game_platform AS T WHERE T.platform_id = 15

question: List down the record ID of records released between 2000 to 2003.
query: SELECT T.id FROM game_platform AS T WHERE T.release_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2003

question: What is the number of sales in region ID 2 with game platform ID 9615?
query: SELECT T.num_sales * 100000 FROM region_sales AS T WHERE T.region_id = 2 AND T.game_platform_id = 9615

question: List down the names of platform where the games released in 2016 can be played on.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.platform_name FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id WHERE T2.release_year = 2016

question: When was the game titled 3DS Classic Collection released?
query: SELECT T1.release_year FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id WHERE T3.game_name = '3DS Classic Collection'

question: What is the average number of sales in Japan?
query: SELECT AVG(T2.num_sales) * 100000 AS avg_japan FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id WHERE T1.region_name = 'Japan'

question: Give the genre of the games released from 2000 to 2002.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T4.genre_name FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T3.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T1.release_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2002

question: List down the name of games published by 3DO.
query: SELECT T1.game_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T3.publisher_name = '3DO'

question: How many role-playing games are there?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.id) FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T2.genre_name = 'Role-Playing'

question: List the region name where games reached 300000 sales and above.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.region_name FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id WHERE T2.num_sales * 100000 > 300000

question: Which company published the game with the most sales in North America?
query: SELECT T.publisher_name FROM ( SELECT T5.publisher_name, SUM(T2.num_sales) * 100000 FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.game_platform_id = T3.id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T4 ON T3.game_publisher_id = T4.id INNER JOIN publisher AS T5 ON T4.publisher_id = T5.id WHERE T1.region_name = 'North America' GROUP BY T5.publisher_name ORDER BY SUM(T2.num_sales) * 100000 DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: What is the release year of the game that gained 350000 sales in North America?
query: SELECT T3.release_year FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.game_platform_id = T3.id WHERE T2.num_sales * 100000 = 350000 AND T1.region_name = 'North America'

question: In which platform does the game titled 15 Days available?
query: SELECT T1.platform_name FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T2.game_publisher_id = T3.id INNER JOIN game AS T4 ON T3.game_id = T4.id WHERE T4.game_name = 'Counter Force'

question: Give the name of the publisher of the game ID 75.
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id WHERE T1.game_id = 75

question: What is the title of the game that gained the most sales in Japan?
query: SELECT T.game_name FROM ( SELECT T5.game_name FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.game_platform_id = T3.id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T4 ON T3.game_publisher_id = T4.id INNER JOIN game AS T5 ON T4.game_id = T5.id WHERE T1.region_name = 'Japan' ORDER BY T2.num_sales DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: Provide the game publisher's name of the game with sales greater than 90% of the average sales in Japan.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T5.publisher_name FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.game_platform_id = T3.id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T4 ON T3.game_publisher_id = T4.id INNER JOIN publisher AS T5 ON T4.publisher_id = T5.id WHERE T2.num_sales * 10000000 > ( SELECT AVG(T2.num_sales) * 100000 * 90 FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id WHERE T1.region_name = 'Japan' )

question: Among the games released in 2004, what is the percentage of games on PSP?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.platform_name = 'PSP' THEN T3.game_id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T3.game_id) FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T2.game_publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T2.release_year = 2004

question: How many games were released in 1981?
query: SELECT COUNT(T.id) FROM game_platform AS T WHERE T.release_year = 1981

question: What is the genre ID of the '2Xtreme' game?
query: SELECT T.genre_id FROM game AS T WHERE T.game_name = '2Xtreme'

question: Sum the total game sales in every region for platform ID 9658.
query: SELECT SUM(T.num_sales) * 100000 FROM region_sales AS T WHERE T.game_platform_id = 9658

question: Provide the ID of 1C Company.
query: SELECT T.id FROM publisher AS T WHERE T.publisher_name = '1C Company'

question: Provide the genre name of the genre ID 3.
query: SELECT T.genre_name FROM genre AS T WHERE T.id = 3

question: List the game IDs that were released in 2017.
query: SELECT T.id FROM game_platform AS T WHERE T.release_year = 2017

question: When was the "Adventure Island" game released?
query: SELECT T3.release_year FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.game_publisher_id WHERE T1.game_name = 'Adventure Island'

question: How many games are puzzle genre?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.id) FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T2.genre_name = 'Puzzle'

question: Provide the games that can be played on the SCD platform.
query: SELECT T4.game_name FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN platform AS T2 ON T1.platform_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T3.id INNER JOIN game AS T4 ON T3.game_id = T4.id WHERE T2.platform_name = 'SCD'

question: How many games were published by Acclaim Entertainment?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T1.game_id) FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Acclaim Entertainment'

question: Name the publisher of the Chronicles of the Sword game.
query: SELECT T3.publisher_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T1.game_name = 'Chronicles of the Sword'

question: Provide the number of games sold in North America on the PS4 platform.
query: SELECT SUM(T1.num_sales * 100000) FROM region_sales AS T1 INNER JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T1.game_platform_id = T3.id INNER JOIN platform AS T4 ON T3.platform_id = T4.id WHERE T2.region_name = 'North America' AND T4.platform_name = 'PS4'

question: Provide the ID of the most popular platform in Europe.
query: SELECT T.game_platform_id FROM ( SELECT T1.game_platform_id, SUM(T1.num_sales) FROM region_sales AS T1 INNER JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id = T2.id WHERE T2.region_name = 'Europe' GROUP BY T1.game_platform_id ORDER BY SUM(T1.num_sales) DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: Name the game released in 2011.
query: SELECT T3.game_name FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id WHERE T1.release_year = 2011

question: How many games can be played on the Wii platform?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.id) FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN platform AS T2 ON T1.platform_id = T2.id WHERE T2.platform_name = 'Wii'

question: Provide any five games and release year under the sports genre.
query: SELECT T3.game_name, T1.release_year FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T3.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T4.genre_name = 'Sports' LIMIT 5

question: Mention the genre of the 2Xtreme.
query: SELECT T2.id FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T1.game_name = '2Xtreme'

question: Provide the platform where the Panzer Tactics can be played.
query: SELECT T4.platform_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.game_publisher_id INNER JOIN platform AS T4 ON T3.platform_id = T4.id WHERE T1.game_name = 'Panzer Tactics'

question: Calculate how many percent of sales in North America is higher than the average sale per region for platform ID 9577.
query: SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN T2.region_name = 'North America' THEN T1.num_sales ELSE 0 END) - AVG(T1.num_sales)) * 100.0 / AVG(T1.num_sales) FROM region_sales AS T1 INNER JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id = T2.id WHERE T1.game_platform_id = 9577

question: Which game has the longest name?
query: SELECT T.game_name FROM game AS T ORDER BY LENGTH(T.game_name) DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many games were released in 2001?
query: SELECT COUNT(T.id) FROM game_platform AS T WHERE T.release_year = 2001

question: What is the total number of sales across all regions?
query: SELECT SUM(T.num_sales) * 100000 FROM region_sales t

question: What is the average number of games published by a publisher?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(T.game_id) AS REAL) / COUNT(DISTINCT T.publisher_id) FROM game_publisher AS T

question: What is the first year a game is released?
query: SELECT MIN(T.release_year) FROM game_platform t

question: What is the least common game genre?
query: SELECT T.game_name FROM ( SELECT T2.game_name, COUNT(T2.id) FROM genre AS T1 INNER JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.genre_id GROUP BY T2.game_name ORDER BY COUNT(T2.id) ASC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: Which is the publisher for the game "Prism: Light the Way"?
query: SELECT T1.publisher_name FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id WHERE T3.game_name = 'Prism: Light the Way'

question: List the platforms that release the most games each year.
query: SELECT T1.platform_name FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T2.game_publisher_id = T3.id GROUP BY T2.release_year, T1.platform_name ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT T3.game_id) DESC

question: How many games do not have any sales in Europe?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM region_sales AS T1 INNER JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id = T2.id WHERE T2.region_name = 'Europe' AND T1.num_sales = 0

question: What are the games that were released in 2006?
query: SELECT T3.game_name FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id WHERE T1.release_year = 2006

question: What is the genre of the game "Mario vs. Donkey Kong"?
query: SELECT T1.genre_name FROM genre AS T1 INNER JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.genre_id WHERE T2.game_name = 'Mario vs. Donkey Kong'

question: Which publisher published the most games?
query: SELECT T.publisher_name FROM ( SELECT T1.publisher_name, COUNT(DISTINCT T2.game_id) FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id GROUP BY T1.publisher_name ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT T2.game_id) DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: List all the platform games.
query: SELECT T2.game_name FROM genre AS T1 INNER JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.genre_id WHERE T1.genre_name = 'Platform'

question: What are the years that "WiiU" got a new game?
query: SELECT T2.release_year FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id WHERE T1.platform_name = 'WiiU' ORDER BY T2.release_year DESC LIMIT 1

question: Which game has the most sales in Japan?
query: SELECT T5.game_name FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.game_platform_id = T3.id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T4 ON T3.game_publisher_id = T4.id INNER JOIN game AS T5 ON T4.game_id = T5.id WHERE T1.region_name = 'Japan' ORDER BY T2.num_sales DESC LIMIT 1

question: List the games from the publisher "Activision".
query: SELECT T3.game_name FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id WHERE T1.publisher_name = 'Activision'

question: How many different publishers have published a game that starts with "Marvel"?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T1.publisher_id) FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.game_id = T2.id WHERE T2.game_name LIKE 'Marvel%'

question: What percentage of games are sports?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.genre_name = 'Sports' THEN T2.id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T2.id) FROM genre AS T1 INNER JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.genre_id

question: What is the ratio of game sales between North America and Japan?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.region_name = 'North America' THEN T1.num_sales ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CASE WHEN T2.region_name = 'Japan' THEN T1.num_sales ELSE 0 END) FROM region_sales AS T1 INNER JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id = T2.id

question: Which year has the most number of video game releases?
query: SELECT T1.release_year FROM ( SELECT T.release_year, COUNT(id) FROM game_platform AS T GROUP BY T.release_year ORDER BY COUNT(T.id) DESC LIMIT 1 ) T1

question: How many video game publishers have Interactive in their names?
query: SELECT COUNT(T.id) FROM publisher AS T WHERE T.publisher_name LIKE '%Interactive%'

question: What are the top 2 platforms with the most sales in North America?
query: SELECT T4.platform_name FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.game_platform_id = T3.id INNER JOIN platform AS T4 ON T3.platform_id = T4.id WHERE T1.region_name = 'North America' ORDER BY T2.num_sales DESC LIMIT 2

question: How many games did BMG Interactive Entertainment release in 2012?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T2.game_id) FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.game_publisher_id WHERE T3.release_year = 2012

question: What is the name of the publisher that released the most video games in 2007?
query: SELECT T3.publisher_name FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T1.release_year = 2007 GROUP BY T3.publisher_name ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT T2.game_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many publishers published the Minecraft game?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.publisher_id) FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id WHERE T1.game_name = 'Minecraft'

question: Which publisher has published the most number of Action games?
query: SELECT T.publisher_name FROM ( SELECT T4.publisher_name, COUNT(DISTINCT T2.id) FROM genre AS T1 INNER JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.genre_id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T4 ON T3.publisher_id = T4.id WHERE T1.genre_name = 'Action' GROUP BY T4.publisher_name ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT T2.id) DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: How many Sports games did Nintendo publish?
query: SELECT COUNT(T3.id) FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T3.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T4.genre_name = 'Sports' AND T1.publisher_name = 'Nintendo'

question: What is the genre of the game '2 Games in 1: Sonic Advance & ChuChu Rocket!'?
query: SELECT T2.genre_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T1.game_name = '2 Games in 1: Sonic Advance & ChuChu Rocket!'

question: How many times did other regions make positive sales in DS platform?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T2.id) FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN region_sales AS T3 ON T1.id = T3.game_platform_id INNER JOIN region AS T4 ON T3.region_id = T4.id WHERE T1.platform_name = 'DS' AND T4.region_name = 'Other' AND T3.num_sales > 0

question: What are the names of the games published by American Softworks?
query: SELECT T3.game_name FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id WHERE T1.publisher_name = 'American Softworks'

question: How many strategy games are there?
query: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.genre_name = 'Strategy' THEN T2.id ELSE NULL END) FROM genre AS T1 INNER JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.genre_id

question: Which publisher published Overwatch?
query: SELECT T3.publisher_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T1.game_name = 'Overwatch'

question: What is the name of the genre with the most number of video games?
query: SELECT T2.genre_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T2.id = T1.genre_id GROUP BY T2.genre_name ORDER BY COUNT(T1.genre_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the number of games sold in Europe for game platform ID 26?
query: SELECT T2.num_sales * 100000 AS nums_eur FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id WHERE T2.game_platform_id = 26 AND T1.region_name = 'Europe'

question: How many games were released in the year 2001?
query: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM game_platform AS T WHERE T.release_year = 2001

question: How many games include the word 'Box' in their name?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT T.game_name FROM game AS T WHERE T.game_name LIKE '%Box%' )

question: What are the three largest numbers of games sold?
query: SELECT T.game_platform_id, SUM(T.num_sales) * 100000 FROM region_sales AS T GROUP BY game_platform_id ORDER BY SUM(T.num_sales) * 100000 DESC LIMIT 3

question: What year were the first game released?
query: SELECT T.release_year FROM game_platform AS T ORDER BY T.release_year ASC LIMIT 1

question: What publishers have the word 'Entertainment' in their name?
query: SELECT T.publisher_name FROM publisher AS T WHERE T.publisher_name LIKE '%Entertainment%'

question: Indicate the name of all adventure games.
query: SELECT T2.game_name FROM genre AS T1 INNER JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.genre_id WHERE T1.genre_name = 'Adventure'

question: List the name of all games published by 'Pioneer LDC'.
query: SELECT T3.game_name FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id WHERE T1.publisher_name = 'Pioneer LDC'

question: Indicate the name of all the games published for the 'SCD' platform.
query: SELECT T1.game_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.game_publisher_id INNER JOIN platform AS T4 ON T3.platform_id = T4.id WHERE T4.platform_name = 'SCD'

question: List the name of all games published in Japan.
query: SELECT T1.game_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.game_publisher_id INNER JOIN region_sales AS T4 ON T3.id = T4.game_platform_id INNER JOIN region AS T5 ON T4.region_id = T5.id WHERE T5.region_name = 'Japan'

question: What genres are the games published by 'Agatsuma Entertainment'?
query: SELECT T4.genre_name FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T3.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T1.publisher_name = 'Agatsuma Entertainment'

question: How many games are not of the genres 'Role-Playing', 'Shooter' and 'Simulation'?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.id) FROM genre AS T1 INNER JOIN game AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.genre_id WHERE T1.genre_name NOT IN ('Role-Playing', 'Shooter', 'Simulation')

question: Indicate, by region, which platform has sold the most games.
query: SELECT T.region_name FROM ( SELECT T1.platform_name, T4.region_name, SUM(T3.num_sales) FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN region_sales AS T3 ON T1.id = T3.game_platform_id INNER JOIN region AS T4 ON T3.region_id = T4.id GROUP BY T1.platform_name, T4.region_name ORDER BY SUM(T3.num_sales) DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: Which publisher has published the most games in the 'Puzzle' genre?
query: SELECT T.publisher_name FROM ( SELECT T1.publisher_name, COUNT(T3.id) FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T3.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T4.genre_name = 'Puzzle' GROUP BY T1.publisher_name ORDER BY COUNT(T3.id) DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: Which game has sold the fewest units?
query: SELECT T.game_name FROM ( SELECT T1.game_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.game_publisher_id INNER JOIN region_sales AS T4 ON T3.id = T4.game_platform_id ORDER BY T4.num_sales LIMIT 1 ) t

question: Which publisher has published the game 'Pachi-Slot Kanzen Kouryaku 3: Universal Koushiki Gaido Volume 3'?
query: SELECT T1.publisher_name FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id WHERE T3.game_name = 'Pachi-Slot Kanzen Kouryaku 3: Universal Koushiki Gaido Volume 3'

question: In which regions has the game 'Pengo' been sold?
query: SELECT T5.region_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.game_publisher_id INNER JOIN region_sales AS T4 ON T3.id = T4.game_platform_id INNER JOIN region AS T5 ON T4.region_id = T5.id WHERE T1.game_name = 'Pengo'

question: List by name all the games released in the year 2010.
query: SELECT T1.game_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.game_publisher_id WHERE T3.release_year = '2010'

question: Calculate the average game sales for the PS2 platform.
query: SELECT SUM(T3.num_sales * 100000) / COUNT(T1.id) FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN region_sales AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.game_platform_id WHERE T1.platform_name = 'PS2'

question: Calculate the percentage of games published by 'Brash Entertainment'?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.publisher_name = 'Brash Entertainment' THEN T2.game_id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T2.game_id) FROM publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.publisher_id

question: What is the total number of games sold in region ID 1?
query: SELECT SUM(T.num_sales * 100000) FROM region_sales AS T WHERE T.region_id = 1

question: How many FIFA games are there across all platforms?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT T.game_name FROM game AS T WHERE T.game_name LIKE '%FIFA%' )

question: Which platform is the most popular in Europe?
query: SELECT T.platform_name FROM ( SELECT T4.platform_name FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.game_platform_id = T3.id INNER JOIN platform AS T4 ON T3.platform_id = T4.id WHERE T1.region_name = 'Europe' ORDER BY T2.num_sales DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: Who is the publisher of the game 2002 FIFA World Cup?
query: SELECT T2.publisher_name FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T1.game_id = T3.id WHERE T3.game_name = '2002 FIFA World Cup'

question: What platform is the game 3Xtreme available on?
query: SELECT T2.platform_name FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN platform AS T2 ON T1.platform_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T3.id INNER JOIN game AS T4 ON T3.game_id = T4.id WHERE T4.game_name = '3Xtreme'

question: What genre is the game 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa?
query: SELECT T2.genre_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T1.game_name = '2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa'

question: Which region has the highest number of games sold on all platforms?
query: SELECT T.region_name FROM ( SELECT T2.region_name, SUM(T1.num_sales) FROM region_sales AS T1 INNER JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T1.game_platform_id = T3.id INNER JOIN platform AS T4 ON T3.platform_id = T4.id GROUP BY T4.platform_name ORDER BY SUM(T1.num_sales) DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: How many games were sold on PS3 platform in Japan?
query: SELECT SUM(T1.num_sales * 100000) FROM region_sales AS T1 INNER JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T1.game_platform_id = T3.id INNER JOIN platform AS T4 ON T3.platform_id = T4.id WHERE T2.region_name = 'Japan' AND T4.platform_name = 'PS3'

question: What are the names of games that were released in 2007?
query: SELECT T3.game_name FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id WHERE T1.release_year = 2007

question: How many games were published by Activision?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T3.id) FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T1.game_id = T3.id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Activision'

question: Indicate the release year of the game with more than 200000 sales in Japan.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T3.release_year FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.game_platform_id = T3.id WHERE T2.num_sales * 100000 > 200000 AND T1.region_name = 'Japan'

question: In 2010, how many PS3 games were released?
query: SELECT COUNT(T3.game_id) FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T2.game_publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T1.platform_name = 'PS3' AND T2.release_year = 2010

question: Indicate the publisher who has published the most games of all time.
query: SELECT T.publisher_name FROM ( SELECT T2.publisher_name, COUNT(DISTINCT T1.game_id) FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id GROUP BY T2.publisher_name ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT T1.game_id) DESC LIMIT 1 ) t

question: How many shooter games are there?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.id) FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T2.genre_name = 'Shooter'

question: What is the percentage of games that were released on PS4 in 2014 among all platforms?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T2.platform_name = 'PS4' THEN T3.game_id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T3.game_id) FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN platform AS T2 ON T1.platform_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T1.release_year = 2014

question: How much are the sales of the games in region ID 4?
query: SELECT SUM(T.num_sales) * 100000 FROM region_sales AS T WHERE T.region_id = 4

question: List down the game platform IDs of games with a region ID of 1.
query: SELECT T.game_platform_id FROM region_sales AS T WHERE T.region_id = 1

question: Calculate the difference between sales of games from region ID 2 and region ID 3.
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T.region_id = 2 THEN T.num_sales ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN T.region_id = 3 THEN T.num_sales ELSE 0 END) FROM region_sales t

question: List down the platform IDs of the games released in 2007.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T.platform_id FROM game_platform AS T WHERE T.release_year = 2007

question: State the game publisher IDs of the games with a platform ID of 16.
query: SELECT T.game_publisher_id FROM game_platform AS T WHERE T.platform_id = 16

question: Calculate the number of game publisher IDs for games released in 1984.
query: SELECT COUNT(T.game_publisher_id) FROM game_platform AS T WHERE T.release_year = 1984

question: List down the platform IDs of the games with a region ID of 3.
query: SELECT T2.id FROM region_sales AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.game_platform_id = T2.id WHERE T1.region_id = 3

question: What are the sales made by the games in Japan region?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.region_name = 'Japan' THEN T1.num_sales ELSE 0 END) AS nums FROM region_sales AS T1 INNER JOIN region AS T2 ON T1.region_id = T2.id

question: How many game publisher IDs have published games on the X360 platform?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.game_publisher_id) FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN platform AS T2 ON T1.platform_id = T2.id WHERE T2.platform_name = 'X360'

question: State the name of the platforms for games released in 2000.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.platform_name FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN platform AS T2 ON T1.platform_id = T2.id WHERE T1.release_year = 2000

question: Find out the difference between the number of publishers who released the games on the PS3 and X360.
query: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN T2.platform_name = 'PS3' THEN T1.game_publisher_id ELSE NULL END) - COUNT(CASE WHEN T2.platform_name = 'X360' THEN T1.game_publisher_id ELSE NULL END) FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN platform AS T2 ON T1.platform_id = T2.id

question: What are the game IDs of the games published by Bethesda Softworks?
query: SELECT T1.game_id FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Bethesda Softworks'

question: Calculate the total number of IDs for the game published by Capcom and Sony Computer Entertainment.
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T1.game_id) FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id WHERE T2.publisher_name IN ('Capcom', 'Sony Computer Entertainment')

question: What is the genre of the game "Grand Theft Auto V"?
query: SELECT T2.genre_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T1.game_name = 'Grand Theft Auto V'

question: List down the names of the games in the racing genre.
query: SELECT T1.game_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T2.genre_name = 'Racing'

question: Calculate the number of games in the fighting genre.
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.id) FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T2.genre_name = 'Fighting'

question: What are the genres of games published by the publisher with an ID of 464?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.genre_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T1.id = T3.game_id WHERE T3.publisher_id = 464

question: Find out the platform of the game "Final Fantasy XIII-2".
query: SELECT T4.platform_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.game_publisher_id INNER JOIN platform AS T4 ON T3.platform_id = T4.id WHERE T1.game_name = 'Final Fantasy XIII-2'

question: Calculate the total sales made by the games released in 2000.
query: SELECT SUM(T1.num_sales) FROM region_sales AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.game_platform_id = T2.id WHERE T2.release_year = 2000

question: Calculate the difference in sales between the games released in 1990 and 2000.
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.release_year = 2000 THEN T1.num_sales ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN T2.release_year = 1990 THEN T1.num_sales ELSE 0 END) FROM region_sales AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.game_platform_id = T2.id

question: What are the platform IDs of records released in 2006?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T.platform_id FROM game_platform AS T WHERE T.release_year = 2006

question: Compute the average number of sales in region ID 3.
query: SELECT AVG(T.num_sales * 100000) FROM region_sales AS T WHERE T.region_id = 3

question: In which year did the record ID 19 with game publisher ID 6657 released?
query: SELECT T.release_year FROM game_platform AS T WHERE T.game_publisher_id = 6657 AND T.id = 19

question: Calculate the total sales in all regions with game platform ID 66.
query: SELECT SUM(T.num_sales) * 100000 FROM region_sales AS T WHERE T.game_platform_id = 66

question: Give the game name of the game ID 44.
query: SELECT T.game_name FROM game AS T WHERE T.id = 44

question: List the games available on Wii.
query: SELECT T4.game_name FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T2.game_publisher_id = T3.id INNER JOIN game AS T4 ON T3.game_id = T4.id WHERE T1.platform_name = 'Wii'

question: Provide the name of games released in 2015.
query: SELECT T3.game_name FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id WHERE T1.release_year = 2015

question: What is the total number of adventure games released in 2005?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T3.id) FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id INNER JOIN genre AS T4 ON T3.genre_id = T4.id WHERE T4.genre_name = 'Adventure' AND T1.release_year = 2005

question: What is the name of the company that produced the game titled Adventure Time: Explore the Dungeon Because I Don't Know!?
query: SELECT T3.publisher_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_id INNER JOIN publisher AS T3 ON T2.publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T1.game_name = 'Adventure Time: Explore the Dungeon Because I Don''t Know!'

question: List down the game platform ID and region name where the games achieved 20000 sales and below.
query: SELECT T2.game_platform_id, T1.region_name FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id WHERE T2.num_sales * 100000 <= 20000

question: Provide the name of game produced by 505 Games in 2006.
query: SELECT T3.game_name FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id INNER JOIN publisher AS T4 ON T2.publisher_id = T4.id WHERE T4.publisher_name = '505 Games' AND T1.release_year = 2006

question: What is the genre of the game ID 119?
query: SELECT T2.genre_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T1.id = 119

question: List the game IDs of the games produced by Abylight.
query: SELECT T1.game_id FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN publisher AS T2 ON T1.publisher_id = T2.id WHERE T2.publisher_name = 'Abylight'

question: In which region where a game had the lowest number of sales?
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.region_name FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id ORDER BY T2.num_sales LIMIT 1

question: List down the name of strategy games.
query: SELECT T1.game_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T2.genre_name = 'Strategy'

question: In what platform does the game ID 178 available?
query: SELECT T3.platform_name FROM game_publisher AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.game_publisher_id INNER JOIN platform AS T3 ON T2.platform_id = T3.id WHERE T1.game_id = 178

question: Give the genre of the following game titled 'Airlock' , 'Airline Tycoon' , and 'Airblade', respectively.
query: SELECT T2.genre_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T1.game_name IN ('Airlock', 'Airline Tycoon', 'Airblade')

question: Calculate the total number of sales in North America.
query: SELECT SUM(T2.num_sales) * 100000 AS nums FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id WHERE T1.region_name = 'North America'

question: List down at least five publishers of the games with number of sales less than 10000.
query: SELECT T.publisher_name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT T5.publisher_name FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.game_platform_id = T3.id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T4 ON T3.game_publisher_id = T4.id INNER JOIN publisher AS T5 ON T4.publisher_id = T5.id WHERE T1.region_name = 'North America' AND T2.num_sales * 100000 < 10000 LIMIT 5 ) t

question: List the platform ID of the game titled Airborne Troops: Countdown to D-Day.
query: SELECT T1.platform_id FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T2.id INNER JOIN game AS T3 ON T2.game_id = T3.id WHERE T3.game_name = 'Airborne Troops: Countdown to D-Day'

question: How many games available on PSP were released in 2004?
query: SELECT COUNT(T3.game_id) FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T2.game_publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T1.platform_name = 'PSP' AND T2.release_year = 2004

question: What is the genre of the game titled '999: Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors' ?
query: SELECT T2.genre_name FROM game AS T1 INNER JOIN genre AS T2 ON T1.genre_id = T2.id WHERE T1.game_name = '999: Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors'

question: When was the game ID 156 released?
query: SELECT T1.release_year FROM game_platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T2 ON T1.game_publisher_id = T2.id WHERE T2.game_id = 156

question: What is the diffrence between the number of games produced by Culture Brain that can be played on SNES and DS?
query: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.platform_name = 'SNES' THEN T3.game_id ELSE NULL END) - COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.platform_name = 'DS' THEN T3.game_id ELSE NULL END) FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T2.game_publisher_id = T3.id INNER JOIN publisher AS T4 ON T3.publisher_id = T4.id WHERE T4.publisher_name = 'Culture Brain'

question: In games that can be played on Wii, what is the percentage of games released in 2007?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T2.release_year = 2007 THEN T3.game_id ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T3.game_id) FROM platform AS T1 INNER JOIN game_platform AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.platform_id INNER JOIN game_publisher AS T3 ON T2.game_publisher_id = T3.id WHERE T1.platform_name = 'Wii'

question: Among games sold in Europe, list the platform ID of games with sales lesser than 30% of the average number of sales.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T3.platform_id FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id INNER JOIN game_platform AS T3 ON T2.game_platform_id = T3.id WHERE T1.region_name = 'Europe' AND T2.num_sales * 100 * 100000 < ( SELECT AVG(T2.num_sales * 100000) * 30 FROM region AS T1 INNER JOIN region_sales AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.region_id WHERE T1.region_name = 'Europe' )
